overview: Mina and Mariana are two transgender prostitutes working in the Bois de Boulogne. They share an old truck and work part-time, one in the morning, the other at night. Their stories deliberately captured in their workplace to the rhythm of traffic and engine noises, gradually immerse us in their world much larger and more complex than the apparent lightness they proudly display.
title: Allée Reine Marguerite
